New Records: Devin Booker became the sixth player in Suns history to record 3,000 career assists
Key Match Events: The Suns lost to the Lakers by a score of 123-116
Pre-Game Insights: Booker had ten points and one assist while shooting 4/7 from the field and 2/3 from the three-point range in his first nine minutes of action
Post-Match Reflections: The Suns come into the night with a 1-0 record after defeating the Los Angeles Clippers by a score of 116-113 on Wednesday evening
Miscellaneous Highlights: Booker finished the victory with 15 points, four rebounds, six assists, one steal and one block while shooting 5/9 from the field and 4/5 from the three-point range in 32 minutes
Others: Booker was the 13th pick in the 2015 NBA Draft out of Kentucky, and is in his tenth NBA season (all with the Suns)
